name: Wide Open
description:
'Wide Open' was born out of a love for old school, top down offroad racing games. Offroad racing has come a long way since the days of the 8 bit and 16 bit systems and this game intends to reflect those evolutions. With a fully deformable terrain you can be sure that no lap will be like the last. You can enjoy timing big jumps and drifting corners. There are many terrain types like asphalt, dirt, sand, mud and more! Numerous tracks are available and more will be on their way.

Single Player

  • *Several Vehicles to select from
    *Change number of laps
    *Real time terrain deformation changing the track lap to lap
    *Fully adjustable orbital 3rd person camera
    *Different ground types ex. mud, loam, sand, hard-packed, etc
    *AI racing


Multiplayer

  • *Go online and race your friends
    *Add AI to your online races
    *Real time terrain deformation changing the track lap to lap
